name: Flame Knight
description: A warrior imbued with elemental fire, wielding a blade that burns with eternal flames.
tactics: The Flame Knight charges into melee combat, using their flaming sword to deal both physical and fire damage. They use Flame Shield when surrounded by enemies.

actions.name: Flaming Sword Strike
actions.description: The knight strikes with their enchanted blade, dealing both slashing and fire damage.

actions.name: Flame Shield
actions.description: The knight surrounds themselves with a shield of fire. Any creature that hits them with a melee attack takes fire damage.

reactions.name: Fiery Riposte
reactions.trigger: When an enemy misses the knight with a melee attack
reactions.description: The knight immediately makes a Flaming Sword Strike against the attacker.

traits.name: Fire Immunity
traits.description: The Flame Knight takes no damage from heat sources.

traits.name: Burning Aura
traits.description: At the start of each turn, all creatures within 1 unit take 1 heat damage.
